summary: This is a forwarded email from June 28, 2019, containing forwarded information about Jeffrey Epstein's sex offender status from the NYS eJustice Portal and the NYPD DAS. It includes attachments with data on Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded information regarding his sex offender status from official sources.

events.title: Forwarding of Epstein Sex Offender Information
events.description: An email is forwarded containing official information about Jeffrey Epstein's status as a sex offender, sourced from the NYS eJustice Portal and the NYPD DAS.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from June 28, 2019, forwarding official information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The information pertains specifically to Epstein's status as a sex offender.
The data sources are identified as the New York State eJustice Portal and the NYPD's DAS (likely Data Analysis Section or similar unit).
The email contains attachments with detailed information, though the specific content of the attachments is not provided in the snippet.
